description.narrative: This activity (Teacher Development Programme: Technical Assistance) is a component of TEACHER DEVELOPMENT PROGRAMME reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £31,901,118. This component benefits Nigeria, and works in the following sector(s): Teacher training, Educational research, Higher education, Advanced technical and managerial training. , with the following implementing partners: Mott MacDonald Limited, Oxford Policy Management. The start date is 18-10-2012 and the end date is 31-08-2019.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
